page.title: 11Industry
page.content: The major industry in the area is agriculture and many other industries are connected with this. Palethorpes manufacture pies, cooked meats and pizzas at their Maer Lane factory. SKH manufacture farm machinery at their Adderley Road premises which were originally used for the manufacture of prefabricated buildings. Vantec assemble electrical components in a factory adjacent to the Tern at Walkmill. This factory, built on a council rubbish tip, was originally concerned with the shaping of nylon stockings. The largest employer of labour is Kitty Little, manufacturers of spice ropes for the home and export market. However most of these workers are homeworkers and the company has a small headquarters on the new industrial estate in Maer Lane.
